pageProduct.name: Palmers Shea Butter Formula with Vitamin E Lotion 250mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Shea Formula Raw Shea Body Lotion naturally contains a high level of antioxidant rich emollients that create a protective moisture-seal to help prevent skin hydration. This rich, nourishing ingredient is the building block for softer, radiant skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Sustainably sourced in Africa, raw natural Shea Butter provides a youthful radiant glow, balances tone and texture, and soothes dry skin irritation.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Propylene Glycol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Tocopheryol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, PEG-40 Stearate, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Sulfite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Stearyl Alcohol, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional.

Directions

Apply daily, as often as you like, all over body.
